content: Since the beginning of 2021, we have: announced the acquisition of $1 billion of high-quality office assets in the high-growth markets of Raleigh and Charlotte; we further bolstered our future development prospects by acquiring land in Atlanta, Nashville and Charlotte that can support an additional 800,000 square feet of office and 2 million square feet of mixed-use development; weâve entered Dallas, a high-growth market with significant future upside opportunities, and announced our plan to exit Pittsburgh; weâve sold $494 million of non-core buildings and land; weâve delivered 5% core FFO growth in 2021 and 8% growth year-to-date in 2022; weâve generated significant growth in free cash flow; and all the while maintained a fortress balance sheet and setting the foundation for future growth.
